title: How the 'circular economy' went from environmentalist dream to marketing buzzword - Grist
summary: Corporations are facing increasing pressure to reduce their environmental impact. The circular economy is one way that businesses can do this. However, the term "circular economy" is often used without a clear definition. This can lead to confusion and greenwashing. It is important to define what is meant by "circular economy" in order to ensure that businesses are actually making progress towards sustainability.

title: Benefits of Using Digital Twins Across Industries - AiThority
summary: Digital twins are virtual models that accurately reflect a physical object, process, or system. They are used to monitor, analyze, and optimize the performance of assets or processes, as well as to simulate and predict outcomes. Digital twins are transforming industries by enabling businesses to improve operational efficiency, drive innovation, and optimize resource utilization.

title: Pedaling Towards a Sustainable Future with the Power of Electric Bicycles - EP Magazine
summary: Electric bikes (e-bikes) are gaining popularity as a sustainable mode of transportation, offering environmental and health benefits. E-bikes reduce air pollution by eliminating tailpipe emissions and promote physical activity, making them an attractive option for commuters and recreational riders. The adoption of e-bikes contributes to a more sustainable and livable urban environment.
